title: Former Ambassador to Japan Roos on Launching VC Fund (Audio)
itunes:title: Former Ambassador to Japan Roos on Launching VC Fund (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: John Roos, Founding Partner of VC firm Geodesic Capital and former U.S. Ambassador to Japan, on launching a $335 million growth fund with Mitsubishi to help American growth-stage companies expand into Japan and other countries in the region.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
